mapper.insert: insert into Apply(post_id, id, introduce) values(#{post_id}, #{id},#{introduce})
mapper.select: select case when (p.id != a.id) then true else false end as 'isValidId' from Apply a, Post p where a.id = #{param1} and p.post_id = #{param2}
select case when (count(post_id) > 0) then true else false end as 'isAlreadyApply' from Apply where id=#{param1} and post_id=#{param2}
